Name: Ubiquiti
Natural: The Ubiquiti Dream Machine (UDM) is an all-in-one UniFi Gateway and WiFi 5 access point with a quad-core processor, 4 GbE LAN ports, built-in UniFi Network management, and advanced security features, ideal for small offices and tech-savvy homes.

Name: Synology
Natural: The Synology RT2600ac router delivers fast, secure Wi-Fi with up to 5 networks, VLAN support, Safe Access parental controls, and powerful VPN capabilities, perfect for home labs, businesses, and smart homes.

Name: Google Nest
Natural: The Google Nest Wifi Pro offers fast, reliable Wi-Fi 6E mesh coverage, ensuring smoother video streaming, better smart home connectivity, and future-proof networking for modern households.

Name: Cisco
Natural: The Cisco RV260 series VPN routers feature dual-core processing, eight Gigabit LAN ports, SPI firewall, IPsec/OpenVPN support, and web filtering, offering secure, high-performance networking for small businesses and home offices.

Name: D-Link
Natural: The D-Link AQUILA PRO AI M30 router delivers eco-friendly design, Wi-Fi 6 speeds up to 3 Gbps, AI-enhanced 360Â° coverage, mesh scalability, and premium security features, ideal for eco-conscious tech homes.

Name: Linksys
Natural: The Linksys WRT3200ACM is an open-source Wi-Fi router offering Tri-Stream 160 technology and ultra-fast AC speeds, designed for power users and multi-device households demanding low-latency connectivity.

Name: TP-Link
Natural: The TP-Link Archer C7 is an AC1750 dual-band Gigabit router with concurrent 450 Mbps + 1300 Mbps speeds, USB sharing, OneMesh support, and strong coverage, ideal for most home users seeking reliable performance.

Name: Netgear
Natural: The Netgear Nighthawk AX8 WiFi 6 Router delivers up to 6 Gbps speeds, powered by a 64-bit 1.8GHz quad-core processor with six Gigabit ports, perfect for 4K streaming, gaming, and secure whole-home connectivity.
